content.text: Learn how to create a stacked form with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a stacked form with CSS.

content.text: A vertically stacked form (where inputs and labels are placed on top of each other, instead of next to each other):
content.html: A vertically stacked form (where inputs and labels are placed on top of each other, instead of next to each other):

content.text: How To Create a Stacked Form
Use a <form> element to process the input. You can learn more about this in our PHP tutorial.
content.html: Use a <form> element to process the input. You can learn more about this in our PHP tutorial.

content.text: Add inputs (with a matching label) for each field:
content.html: Add inputs (with a matching label) for each field:

syntaxHighlighting.text: <input type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">
type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name.."

content.code:
<form action="/action_page.php">
  <label for="fname">First 
Name</label>
  <input type="text" id="fname" name="firstname" 
placeholder="Your name..">

  <label for="lname">Last Name</label>
  
<input type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">


  <label for="country">Country</label>
  <select id="country" 
name="country">
    <option value="australia">Australia</option>
    
<option value="canada">Canada</option>
    <option value="usa">USA</option>
  
</select>

  <input type="submit" value="Submit">
</form>

syntax_highlighting.text: <input type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">
type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name.."

content.code_html:
<form action="/action_page.php">
  <label for="fname">First Name</label>
  <input type="text" id="fname" name="firstname" placeholder="Your name..">

  <label for="lname">Last Name</label>
  <input type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">

  <label for="country">Country</label>
  <select id="country" name="country">
    <option value="australia">Australia</option>
    <option value="canada">Canada</option>
    <option value="usa">USA</option>
  </select>

  <input type="submit" value="Submit">
</form>

syntax_highlighting_data.text: <input type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">
type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name.."

syntaxHighlighting.text:
/* Add a background color to the submit button on 
  mouse-over */

syntax_highlighting.text:
/* Add a background color to the submit button on 
  mouse-over */

content.code_html:
/* Style inputs */
  input[type=text], select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 20px;
  margin: 8px 0;
  display: inline-block;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Style the submit button */
input[type=submit] {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #04AA6D;
  color: white;
  padding: 14px 20px;
  margin: 8px 0;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* Add a background color to the submit button on mouse-over */
input[type=submit]:hover {
  background-color: #45a049;
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
/* Add a background color to the submit button on
